title: Crime Alert 10.08.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 10.08.21
description:
A grandson kills his grandmother but wait until you hear why. A sword-wielding man, wearing a ninja suit, surprises some special agents.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
